events.text: These settings should be edited to make the template work for your game. This file should only include constant variables and functions so that it can be safely copied to multiple layouts.

events.name: GAME_NAME
events.comment: Game name used for multiplayer. This must be globally unique, so use a prefix like "UWUNTEthicalGames-" plus project name.

events.name: GAME_INSTANCE_NAME
events.comment: Game instance name used for multiplayer. Can often be left as "default".

events.name: MAX_PEERS_PER_LOBBY
events.comment: Maximum number of peers per lobby (including host). Set 0 for unlimited.

events.name: NUM_ROOM_CODE_CHARACTERS
events.comment: Number of characters in room code. Limited to 3 or 4 (for profanity checks).
